Name: Bounce
About the game: Bounce is a procedurally generated physics-based action game. You get one life and one jump. Touch anything red and you die. Touch a vertical platform or a star and your jump resets. Good luck. Features Gorgeous Minimalistic Graphics Procedurally Generated Infinite Level Physics-Based movement High-Scores Skill-Based Gameplay Influence Time
